content: Examine authentication pages (login, register, forgot-password) for glass/plasma theme usage
Analyze main app pages (dashboard, projects/page.tsx, tasks/page.tsx) for glass-panel and btn-primary usage
Check form components (EnhancedTaskForm.tsx, project creation forms) for input-glass usage
Verify design system consistency in report pages (sample 2-3 from reports section)
Check for separate CSS files that might conflict with main design system
Compile findings with specific file paths and line numbers for inconsistencies
